it.polimi.se2019.Network.RMI

Class RMILogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.Network.RMI.RMILogger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Logger, RMILoggerInterface, java.lang.Runnable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class RMILogger
extends java.lang.Object
implements Logger, java.lang.Runnable, RMILoggerInterface
    This class is used for validation of credentials of a player.

      • verify

        public int verify(java.lang.String u,
                  java.lang.String p)
        Remote method, can be invoked by the remote client. Verifies the credentials of a player and returns a value status of the login.
        Specified by:
        verify in interface RMILoggerInterface
        Parameters:
        u - is the username of the remote player.
        p - is the passwor dof the remote player.
        Returns:
        the login result that is the game port.

      • logIn

        public int logIn()
        Checks the credentials of a player.
        Specified by:
        logIn in interface Logger
        Returns:
        the RMI game port if the player is granted access into the game.

      • checkConnections

        public boolean checkConnections()
        This is the method that actually looks for errors during the login process. It looks for double connections, credentials errors and creates new instances fro each new player.
        Specified by:
        checkConnections in interface Logger
        Returns:
        true if the player is granted access.

      • getGamePort

        public int getGamePort(java.lang.String s)
        Returns a game port onto which the client will open his local registry.
        Specified by:
        getGamePort in interface RMILoggerInterface
        Parameters:
        s - is the username of the player.
        Returns:
        the player selected port.
